import React, { useState } from "react" function AddBounty(props) { const initInputs = { firstName: "", lastName: "", living: true, price: 0, title: "" } const [inputs, setInputs] = useState(initInputs) function handleChange(e) { const { name, value } = e.target setInputs(prevInputs => ( {...prevInputs, [name]: value })) } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() console.log(inputs) props.addBounty(inputs) setInputs(initInputs) } return (



: Amount
: Title
) } export default AddBounty
